newsitem.title: GERMANY: MG metals unit restructures trading.
newsitem.headline: MG metals unit restructures trading.

text.p: German metals trading group MG Handel, a unit of Metallgesellschaft AG, said on Friday that it has restructured its non-ferrous metals and raw material trading under a new name.
The group said trading in Frankfurt, New York and London will be grouped under the name MG Metal & Commodity.

MG said it was combining the Frankfurt-based MG Erz- & Metallhandel GmbH, the London-based Metal & Commodity Ltd and the New York-based Ore & Chemicals Corp und Metal Concentrates International Inc under combined leadership.
